languages.text: В знак приветствия нового Вольного Торговца планетарное представительство Адептус Механикус передало на корабль подношение в виде нескольких универсальных макрокомбайнов, древних машин, чьи остовы были найдены на Янусе и бережно восстановлены. Священные стальные титаны послужат династии фон Валанциус.

To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.
languages.original_text: В знак приветствия нового Вольного Торговца планетарное представительство Адептус Механикус передало на корабль подношение в виде нескольких универсальных макрокомбайнов, древних машин, чьи остовы были найдены на Янусе и бережно восстановлены. Священные стальные титаны послужат династии фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: As a sign of welcome to the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valantius dynasty.

To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

languages.text: Soucieux d'accueillir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} comme il se doit, le bureau planétaire de l'Adeptus Mechanicus a fait porter sur le vaisseau un certain nombre de macroassemblages polyvalents, d'antiques machines sacrées retrouvées à l'état d'épave sur Janus et méticuleusement restaurées. Ces titans d'acier feront une offrande de choix pour la dynastie von Valancius.
languages.original_text: To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Soucieux d'accueillir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} comme il se doit, le bureau planétaire de l'Adeptus Mechanicus a fait porter sur le vaisseau un certain nombre de macroassemblages polyvalents, d'antiques machines sacrées retrouvées à l'état d'épave sur Janus et méticuleusement restaurées. Ces titans d'acier feront une offrande de choix pour la dynastie von Valancius.

languages.text: 为了欢迎新任行商浪人，机械修会的行星办公室特地带来了几台多功能巨型机械。这些古老的机器残骸原本是在加努斯发现的，已经经过了精心修复。这些神圣的钢铁巨人将为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务。
languages.original_text: To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 为了欢迎新任行商浪人，机械修会的行星办公室特地带来了几台多功能巨型机械。这些古老的机器残骸原本是在加努斯发现的，已经经过了精心修复。这些神圣的钢铁巨人将为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服务。

languages.text: Um {mf|den neuen Freihändler|die neue Freihändlerin} zu begrüßen, hat das planetare Büro des Adeptus Mechanicus dem Schiff mehrere vielseitige Makrodrescher zur Verfügung gestellt. Die Wracks dieser uralten Maschinen waren auf Janus gefunden und sorgfältig restauriert worden. Die heiligen Stahltitanen werden der Dynastie derer von Valancius dienen.
languages.original_text: To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Um {mf|den neuen Freihändler|die neue Freihändlerin} zu begrüßen, hat das planetare Büro des Adeptus Mechanicus dem Schiff mehrere vielseitige Makrodrescher zur Verfügung gestellt. Die Wracks dieser uralten Maschinen waren auf Janus gefunden und sorgfältig restauriert worden. Die heiligen Stahltitanen werden der Dynastie von Valancius dienen.

languages.text: Para dar la bienvenida a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la oficina planetaria del Adeptus Mechanicus ha enviado una ofrenda con varios macrocombinadores versátiles a la nave. Se trata de unas máquinas antiguas cuyos restos se encontraron en Janus y fueron cuidadosamente restauradas. Estos sagrados titanes de acero serán ahora propiedad de la dinastía von Valancius.
languages.original_text: To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: Para dar la bienvenida a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la oficina planetaria del Adeptus Mechanicus ha enviado una ofrenda con varios macrocombinadores versátiles a la nave. Se trata de unas máquinas antiguas cuyos restos se encontraron en Janus y fueron cuidadosamente restauradas. Estos sagrados titanes de acero serán ahora propiedad de la dinastía von Valancius.

languages.text: 新しい自由開拓者を歓迎しようと、帝国技術局の惑星事務所は、万能なマクロコンバインを何点か船に持ってきた。ヤヌスで残骸が見つかって、丁寧に修復された古代の機械である。神聖な鋼のタイタンは、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えることとなる。
languages.original_text: To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.

traits.locale_text: 新しい自由開拓者を歓迎しようと、帝国技術局の惑星事務所は、万能なマクロコンバインを何点か船に持ってきた。ヤヌスで残骸が見つかって、丁寧に修復された古代の機械である。神聖な鋼のタイタンは、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えることとなる。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'i selamlamak için Adeptus Mechanicus'un gezegen ofisi, gemiye bazı çok yönlü makrokombinler, cesetleri Janus'ta bulunan ve özenle restore edilen kadim makineler getirdi. Kutsal çelik devler, von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet edecek.
languages.original_text: To welcome the new Rogue Trader, the Adeptus Mechanicus's planetary office brought to the ship an offering of several versatile macrocombines, ancient machines whose carcasses had been found on Janus and carefully restored. The sacred steel titans will serve the von Valancius dynasty.
